/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Red lanterns hang from the lampposts, their vibrant color contrasting with the muted tones of the cityscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's busy traffic. Buildings rise in the background, their windows reflecting the overcast sky. The sky itself is a blanket of gray, casting a soft light over the scene.
